summary: Abstract base class representing a logical quantum control channel. It stores a type identifier and an index, provides validation, naming, and parameter handling, and defines equality, hashing and string representation. Concrete subclasses supply a unique prefix to form serialized names that backends translate to physical signal lines.
business_intent: Enable Qiskit to refer to hardware control signals in a backendâ€‘agnostic way, allowing developers to create new channel types that can be uniquely identified, compared, and parameterized, while delegating the actual hardware mapping to the backend.
